ComicInfo.Title: Los Santos
ComicInfo.Series: Lady Mechanika: La Dama de la Muerte
ComicInfo.Summary:
Lady Mechanika endeavors to put an end to the Jinetes del Infierno, the Riders from Hell who have been terrorizing her newfound friends in the small town of Santa Catrina. The epic conclusion to the Lady Mechanika Day of the Dead special!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A - Direct Edition | Joe Benitez & Peter Steigerwald | 1 | B | Cover B - Direct Edition | Joe Benitez, Martin Montiel, & Sabine Rich | Missing | C/RI | Cover C - 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Joe Benitez & Peter Steigerwald | 2 | D/RE | Cover D - JoeBenitez.com Edition (Limited to 250 copies) | Joe Benitez, Martin Montiel, & Sabine Rich | Missing |
